scripts.prune: docker compose down --rmi all --volumes && npm run clear-docker-cache
scripts.prune:api: docker compose down express-api && docker rmi citz-grs-dats-express-api && npm run clear-docker-cache
scripts.rebuild: npm run prune && npm run up -- --force-recreate
scripts.rebuild:api: npm run prune:api && npm run up -- express-api
